about_the_game:
Please Note: The game is still being developed, and there may be some inconsistencies in the screenshots/videos due to them being from older builds. Particularly in the artwork, which is the main thing being worked on right now. New screenshots will go up closer to release.

Scroll Scramble is a maze puzzle game about a hapless student wizard who just can't get the spells to stay in his head. In a last-ditch effort to learn the magic, our inept hero must travel into the magical scrolls and seek the knowledge in a... more hands-on fashion. You take control of Ian as he navigates the magical scrolls. Each spell is made up of a series of runes, and you must find them all before you can progress to the next spell. It's not just a matter of looking, however. Magic can be dangerous, and those dangers are manifest down here in the scrolls.



  • 24 spells to find, each with a different maze to navigate and different puzzles to unravel
  • An original chiptune soundtrack
  • Collectables provide a little extra challenge for those who want it
  • Controller support
  • 2.5D art style; control 2D sprites in a 3D world
  • Steam achievements



All game entities--including the player--are confined to a grid-based movement system, with wrinkles in the scroll parchment being impassible to all. The scrolls are full of a purple mist that represents the player's ignorance. The mist can hold other entities in place, but the player can remove it simply by walking through it. Once the mist has been removed, any entities it might have been confining can get out, so be careful what you set free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP+), Windows 10, and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Core i3 2.3Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940MX or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A maze puzzle game about an inept wizard who, in a desperate attempt to finally learn some magic, travels into his magical scrolls to hunt down the knowledge he seeks.
